body:
`sql.Open` doesn't actually talk to the database yet. It initializes a connection pool. Upon making a query, a new connection will be established. If you want to ensure that the credentials are correct, you can call the Ping method. Also see the following part of the documentation of Open:

> Open may just validate its arguments without creating a connection
> to the database. To verify that the data source name is valid, call
> Ping.
